site.description: This is the ElectroCodeoGram project homepage and the update site for the ECG Eclipse sensor.

category-def.name: ECG SensorAndLab
category-def.label: ECG EclipseSensor with ECG Lab
category-def.description: ElectroCodeoGram Eclipse Sensor to log programming sessions. It comes with an ECG Lab and is preconfigured to run in Inlineserver mode.
